basic_node.title: High number concentration of atm. particles
basic_node.description: Number concentration of atmospheric aerosol particles in regular automotive lidar surroundings is high enough to interact measurable with laser beams. Number concentration of precipitation particles depending on precipitation intensity.
basic_node.references: [sp18, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/0-387-25101-4_4, Lidar Equation: Transmission term T(R): Extinction coefficient α(R;λ): Number concentration N_j(R); p.10-11]
